attributes.action: Bring the chicken legend back to McDonald’s
attributes.additional_details: I wish for the parliament to do this because I miss the chicken legend so much and I need it back in my life
attributes.background: Bring the chicken legend back to McDonald’s and never take it off the menu again

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what products to sell are a matter for individual hospitality venues, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.
